Reviews.Title: Great TV, except...
Reviews.Author: Karen's Husband
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is great, features are great, but the wait to acquire a picture after changing channels is incredibly long.

Reviews.Title: 29" SanSui
Reviews.Author: Sandi DeL Rosso
Reviews.Content: I love this television this is the second Sansui that I own, this one is in my rv, and it works wonderful with the satelliteI will order this brand again , I would highly recommend it to my friends, also the price is wonderful.Very Happy CustomerSandi

Reviews.Title: Good show
Reviews.Author: Herb "Herb b"
Reviews.Content: Good value. Small overall size fits in my wall unit on top of cable box, while old toshiba26 barely fit alone. Colors different, but ok(settings?). Bought because unit has old style conections so I can connect to 10 yr old DVD,VCR and 30 yr old receiver. Sound seems ok to hearing impaired person, run DVD sound to receiver, may do same for tv.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Bill Eger
Reviews.Content: Good purchase... great quality. The second TV I have gotten of this brand. (The other one is in the bedroom.)

ProductInfo.Name: Sansui SLED2900 29-Inch 720p 60Hz LED TV
